overview:
Tim Gilbert is founder of the innovative price comparison website for shippers of B2B B2C and C2C parcel and courier work, DeliverySupermarket.

Tim has been a leading light in the UK courier industry since 1979, having been a founder committee member of the Despatch Association. His experience ranges across start-ups, disposals, franchising, major account sales, and the use of the internet to aggregate the capacity of couriers and courier companies.

Tim is also founder of http://www.mtvan.com, which is the capacity engine behind DeliverySupermarket. It’s a ground breaking combination of a social networking site and a freight exchange.

Tim is author of Tony’s Guide to the Courier Industry.

web_presences.title: Social networking and freight exchange for the courier industry.
